entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Dotnet 6.0 Websocket Deflate Segfault On Ubuntu #62422
  • Deadlock due to managed code execution while holding the loader lock #62419
  • [API Proposal]: Vector(64|128|256)<Half> support and F16C Intrinsics #62416
  • [API Proposal]: TimeOnly should contain AddMilliseconds and AddTicks methods #62413
  • [API Proposal]: Logging Source Generator - implicitly set LogLevel based on method name decorated by LoggerMessageAttribute #62412

Closed

  • socket BeginReceive EndReceive NET6 System.StackOverflowException #62417
  • DllImport of MacOS frameworks not working on Big Sur #62337
  • NetStandard 2.2 with ISpanFormattable #62414
  • SocketAsyncEventArgs System.StackOverflowException #62386

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: Improve inliner - static readonly fields, pinvokes, Span::Length #62421
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Ensure the JIT view of InstructionSets is correct in the face of JitConfig switches #62420
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] force versioned dotnet.d.ts to always have unix style end of line #62418
    arch-wasm
  • [wasm] load dotnet.js with import in tests #62415
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Work around the browser having a lower timer resolution than the #62411
    arch-wasm, area-System.Diagnostics-mono

Merged

  • [wasm] Re-enable windows wasm AOT tests #62352
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono

Updated

  • Added DrawRectangle overload accepting RectangleF #62385
    area-System.Drawing, community-contribution
  • WIP: first group project for type generator tests 0-99 #61942
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Baseline System.Speech for trimming errors #61874
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework, community-contribution
  • Remove AOT warnings for S.Drawing.Common #61567
    area-System.Drawing, community-contribution
  • Including FastFloat in parsing process #62301
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Ensure that FMA codegen operand swapping matches the lsra selections #62382
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Debugger tests #62389
    NO REVIEW, area-Build-mono
  • Fix bug for Assertion failed '(op3Reg != targetReg) || (op1Reg == targetReg)' during 'Generate code' #62343
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Allow CreateScalarUnsafe to be directly contained by hwintrinsics that support scalar loads #62407
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Revert "[mono][wasm] Fix the passing/returning of small vtypes. (#622… #62380
    * NO MERGE *, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • JIT: handle more cases for MOD/DIV -> UMOD/UDIV transformation #62394
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] benchmark sample modularized #62395
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm] updated samples for ES6 and CJS #62292
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • S.IO.StringReader: Use ReadOnlySpan.IndexOfAny in ReadLine() for performance #60463
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • [mono][wasm] Fix an issue with the passing of small vtypes. #62400
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/6.0] Fix re-initialization of hash objects on CNG. #62403
    area-System.Security
  • Fix Some Date and Time parsing cases #62376
    area-System.Runtime, 7.0.0
